channel.title: Another dueling dupe for dodian... : (
channel.description:
well the story starts with dueling a player staking items, then going to the second window clicking accept once and then right clicking on accept and then waiting till the duel screen goes away to start the duel then click accept again with the rightclick, then you get dubble the amount that you would normaly get when you win.
I have no solution but taking dueling out, which i dont want to do but it must be done, if some one could get together on msn or somthing to help me fix it or reply here that would be nice.
- Killer 99

item.title: Another dueling dupe for dodian... : (
item.dc:creator: @this.sucks this.sucks();
item.description:
@this.sucks wrote:

Create a boolean.

public boolean dupePrevention; In the accept method, declare:

dupePrevention = true;

Then only allow the actions to be performed if dupePrevention = false. Reset it to false when the duel is over.

Read full topic
